Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Awaiting EIC Decision to occur after SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average duration of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision when preceded by SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants with major revision outcomes
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurred more than once
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time until SW-Awaiting EIC Decision is performed after the final occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed in a case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time between the last SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants involving multiple reviewer agreements
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Elapsed time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision compared to the elapsed time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include both SW-Reviewer Agreed and Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases where SW-Reviewer Agreed has already occurred
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time for SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in the longest variant (performance = 47316796.000) following the last SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: the sum of the function base == 47316796.000 where base is the duration between the first time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and the last time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in comparison with the time between RW-Reviewer Agreed and RW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'RW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'RW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Cycle time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision measured from the moment the first reviewer agreed (SW-Reviewer Agreed) until the activity begins
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Awaiting EIC Decision to be reached after SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants resulting in SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
